name: Alex Johnson
lastMessage: What's the update on the venue?
messages: Hi! What’s the update on the venue?
We need to finalize the booking details.
Let me know if there are any changes.
Thanks for keeping me informed.
Looking forward to your update.

name: Jordan Lee
messages: Hello! Have the invitations been sent out?
We need to ensure all guests receive them.
Please confirm the status of the invitations.
Let me know if you need any assistance.
Thanks for your help!

name: Taylor Smith
messages: Hi! Can you confirm the catering details?
We need to finalize the menu options.
Please send over the final catering plan.
Let me know if there are any special requests.
Thanks for your cooperation.

name: Morgan Davis
messages: Hello! Any updates on the audio-visual setup?
We need to confirm the equipment list.
Please provide a status update.
Let me know if there are any issues.
Thanks for your assistance.

name: Casey Wilson
messages: Hi there! Can you check the RSVP status?
We need to know the number of attendees.
Please update the guest list.
Let me know if you need any help.
Thanks for keeping track.

name: Riley Taylor
lastMessage: I need the vendor contacts for the event.
messages: Hi! I need the contact details for the vendors.
Please send me the information as soon as possible.
The vendors need to be briefed on the event requirements.
Let me know if there are any updates.
Thank you for your prompt attention.

name: Jamie Brown
lastMessage: Confirm the setup time for the event.
messages: Hello! Can you confirm the setup time for the event?
We need to finalize the schedule for the setup team.
Please provide a time that works best for you.
The setup needs to be completed before the event starts.
Thanks for your cooperation!

name: Dakota Miller
lastMessage: Do you have any special requests for the event?
messages: Hi! Do you have any special requests for the event?
We want to make sure everything is tailored to your needs.
Please let us know if there are any specific arrangements.
We’re here to ensure everything goes smoothly.
Looking forward to your suggestions.

name: Avery Johnson
lastMessage: Please review the final guest list.
messages: Hello! I’ve sent over the final guest list for review.
Please check and confirm the details.
Let me know if there are any additions or changes.
We need the final list for seating arrangements.
Thanks for your prompt feedback.

name: Cameron Martinez
lastMessage: Are there any changes to the event timeline?
messages: Hi there! Are there any changes to the event timeline?
We need to ensure that everything is on track.
Please review the proposed timeline and confirm.
Let me know if there are any adjustments needed.
Thanks for your assistance!
